channel.title: How do i make server from scratch? plz help me!1
channel.description: can someone help me post everything i need idk how to do it all i need everyhing plz!!!!! ill do anything

item.title: How do i make server from scratch? plz help me!1
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

[quote=“Projeckt Revolution, post:9, topic:160827”][quote author=M00 M00 Pk link=topic=218859.msg1900603#msg1900603 date=1196115854]
If you want to make a server scratch, try this:

Download MoparScape3.2/Aryan. And then open the files, and enter hybridscape.
Then, once you’ve opened HyrbidScape, Change all .class files to .java, i would recomend the "DJ JAVA DECOMPILER 3.9.9.91
Then after you’ve done that, open client.java ( Wich in .class file is clienthandler.class
Then come to a site like this and do some tutorials, to get the low down on java. And then, after some time you will be ready to host your server, do that by looking at the “HOW TO MAKE A SERVER!! TO STOP THE QUESTIONS!!!” Post in this section, wich is stickied at the top.

If this whole community were like m00, we’d all be ignorant and impatient.
One Person Actually Offered Real Help Here…
This Is Why We Dont Get New Members Here. If More People Were Like M00 We May Actually Move Up From Non-Stop C+P Tuts And Stupid Childish Idiots.[/quote]
What exactly was the point of that…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make server from scratch? plz help me!1

item.title: How do i make server from scratch? plz help me!1
item.dc:creator: @zstars zstars
item.description:
@zstars wrote:

Anyone who asks how to make a server from scratch, does not really want to or cannot really make a server from scratch.

Making a server is not setting up a server but coding it.

Read full topic

@Paintball199 wrote:

[quote=“M00 M00 Pk, post:7, topic:160827”]If you want to make a server scratch, try this:

Then, once you’ve opened HyrbidScape, Change all .class files to .java, i would recomend the "DJ JAVA DECOMPILER 3.9.9.91
Then after you’ve done that, open client.java ( Wich in .class file is clienthandler.class

You call that from scratch? Scratch = from Nothing, Create new Java files. ( By Example Client.java, Server.java etc. ) You have to recreate them all. With Nothing.
